titles.title: A bill for the relief of Nancy L. Brady.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Administrative Law and Governmental Relations.

bill.summary: 7/8/1987--Introduced. Authorizes an employee of Griffiss Air Force Base, New York, to transfer, with the approval of the personnel director at such base, accumulated annual and sick leave to another named employee of such base.
